mention.text: 21 nov 89 -- authorized spokespersons have informed the national netowrk that armored personnel carriers were used to evacuate the 20 persons being held hostage by the terrorist farabundo marti national liberation front , fmln , criminals at the sheraton hotel
u.s. citizens who were taken hostage when the cowardly fmln killers attacked the hotel in an attempt to kidnap oas secretary general joao baena soares
the cowardly fmln killers , through their clandestine radio station
a u.s. citizen who works for aid
